posts.name: Findlay Market
posts.note: Findlay Market is a longtime hub of vendors selling meat, produce, and other local foods, plus a seasonal farmers' market.

posts.name: Pho Lang Thang
posts.note: noPho Lang Thang is an upbeat Vietnamese joint inside Findlay Market for bowls of pho and banh mi sandwiches. You should order their Pho along with the head cheese banh mi.

posts.name: Taste of Belgium - Over The Rhine
posts.note: Taste of Belgium - Over The Rhine is a chic spot offering Belgian-tinged dishes alongside a long beer list along with wine and cocktails. Make sure you order the waffle, chicken, and waffle, or the traditional stew made with beer-braised beef. From the Food Network website, 'This spot serves Belgian classics that Guy finds irresistible. He declares the dense Belgian waffle to be “outstanding” and also digs the Belgian pretzel with a side of beer cheese. If you are in the mood for something heartier, try the Carbonnades â€” a traditional stew made with beer-braised beef.'
